name: Handmade Baby Booties
description: Wrap your little one’s feet in warmth and comfort with these beautifully handmade baby booties. Crafted with love and care from soft, breathable yarn, these booties are gentle on delicate skin and perfect for keeping tiny toes cozy all day long.

name: Teddy Travel Nest
description: Bring home a bundle of warmth and whimsy with the Teddy Travel Nest — a lovingly handcrafted crochet creation featuring a tiny teddy bear tucked inside a cozy suitcase bed. This enchanting set includes a mini suitcase, soft mattress, blanket, pillow, and the cutest sleeping teddy, making it a perfect gift, keepsake, or decor piece. Full Set (Suitcase + Teddy + Bedding): 200 DHS. Teddy Only: 50 DHS. Whether for a child’s playtime, a baby shower gift, or a unique collectible, this adorable piece is designed to bring joy at first sight. Lightweight, portable, and full of charm, the Teddy Travel Nest is ready to go wherever you do!

name: Panda Snuggle Set – Baby Blue Edition
description: Wrap your little one in cozy cuteness with our Panda Snuggle Set! This hand-crocheted baby outfit features a soft, sky-blue hooded vest with charming panda face pockets and matching booties, perfect for keeping your baby warm and stylish.

name: Mini Bloom Crochet
description: Brighten someone’s day with our adorable Mini Bloom Crochet Bouquets – a collection of handcrafted mini flower arrangements made entirely from yarn! Each bouquet features a charming mix of colorful blossoms tied with a matching bow, making them a perfect keepsake gift for loved ones.

name: Handmade Baby Booties
description: Wrap your little one's feet in warmth and style with these adorable Handmade Baby Booties. Designed for newborns up to 6 months, these soft crochet shoes offer comfort and elegance with a delicate pink rose embellishment.

name: Crochet Tulip Bouquet
description: A charming floral arrangement featuring soft pink crochet tulips, delicate white flowers, and greenery in an elegant glass vase. Perfect for home décor or gifting! Price: 10 DHS each

name: Floral Wristbands
description: Designed for weddings, Eid, bridal parties, and special celebrations, these soft and comfortable accessories beautifully complement ethnic and festive attire. A perfect keepsake for bridesmaids, friends, and family to cherish the bond of love and togetherness! Price: 30 DHS each

name: Handmade Bouquet
description: A beautifully handcrafted bouquet made with love and precision.

name: Sunbeam Buddy
description: A cheerful companion to brighten your day.

name: Pink Handbag
description: Stylish and practical, perfect for any occasion.

name: Crochet beanies
description: Warm and trendy beanies made with intricate crochet work.

name: Bouquet Photo Frames
description: Unique photo frames with a handcrafted twist.

name: Autumn Bloom Wear
description: Experience comfort with our cozy autumn wear.

name: Baby Bear Snuggle
description: Adorable and snuggly, perfect for your little one.

name: Bear Cub Hoodie
description: Stay cozy with our Bear Cub themed hoodie.

name: Panda Snuggle Tee
description: A cute tee that brings a smile with its playful design.

name: Neon Green Lily
description: Bold, bright, and full of life – a statement piece.
